# Document Header Template

Use this block directly under the document title.

```
# {Title} - {Doc Name}

> game_id: game_0001
> repo: mg-game-0001
> title_kr: {Korean Title}
> title_en: {English Title}
> genre_tags: tag1, tag2, tag3
> doc_type: fun_design | bm_design | monetization_design | ops_design | production_design | character_bible | world_bible | art_style | enemy_design | scene_structure
> source_of_truth: docs/design/gdd_game_0001.json
> last_updated: YYYY-MM-DD
```
